name: ReinId - Real Estate Incentives Identified
tagline: Commercial Real Estate: Grow Lead Generation and Add Value to Your Listings
body:
### Welcome to the ReinID Development Repository.
***
This repository is intended for developers who want access to our cloud services for:

* **Adding Value to commercial listings** for an MLS or Commercial Real Estate web site
* **Obtaining incentives** for a given U.S. location

[Visit ReinID.com](www.reinid.com) for more information about **real estate incentives**.

[Follow ReinId on Twitter](https://twitter.com/ReinIDLLC) to help you keep informed of updates.

### Overview
As this repository grows, we intend to have examples in other languages such as .php. We encourage you to experiment with these APIs as they offer a great value-add to the Commercial Real Estate industry by simply using a property listing's longitude and latitude to retrieve real estate incentives.

### What are Real Estate Incentives?
Real Estate incentives range widely and have been overlooked by the [Commercial Multiple Listing Services (MLS)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Multiple_listing_service)  for **decades**.  _**Real estate incentives** is a generic term used to group any number of programs, such as tax incentives, that are designated by an agency for a geographic area."_

### Why are Real Estate Incentives Important and to Whom?
"Incentives" are vital today and in the future because:
* **U.S. Public**: Many incentives focus on job creation and [Affordable Housing](https://www.hud.gov)
* **Investors and Commercial Developers** use incentives to reduce [financial risk](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Financial_risk), obtain [gap financing](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gap_financing), etc. Investors and developers look for property listings with incentives available.
* **[Commercial Real Estate Brokers](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Real_estate_broker)**, in mass, unfortunately do not know about incentives tied to their listings 
* **Entire Supply Chain of [Real Estate Development](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Real_estate_development)** such as small and large companies who will provide goods and services to new and revitalized properties.

### How Does This Repository Help
In its current state, we used the open source [ASP.Net Property4U project from CodePlex](http://property4u.codeplex.com/) as an ASP.Net MVC example.  We edited/added content to illustrate how to access some basic incentive data. 

### Authors and Contributors
We invite you to contact tweet and [follow ReinId on Twitter](https://twitter.com/ReinIDLLC) to help you keep informed of updates, post questions, etc. for all integration issues for your projects.

### Support or Contact
At this time, this project is in high flux and is intended for software developers who are trying to provide value to existing commercial real estate web site project(s) or anyone seeking to know more about [ReinID or Real Estate Incentives](www.reinid.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
